summary: A small castle off the coast of Solstheim, a scenic player home with lots of bells and whistles!
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][font=Times New Roman][color=#ff0000][size=6]Ravenstone Castle[/size][/color][/font][/b]
[color=#bf9000]-Solstheim Edition-[/color]

[size=2]Forward:
My apologies to anyone who downloaded 1.0; 1.1 is the correct .esp file.[/size]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/Qh0Yju5.jpg[/img]﻿
[font=Times New Roman][size=3][size=5]Y[/size]ou have been given a letter; a notification that a distant relative has passed.
By courier from House Redoran, you were informed that you were left an estate off the coast of Raven Rock, yours to manage and defend.
A small castle in ruins, but a hearth well-maintained. A home called Ravenstone.


[font=Arial]I designed this in mind for a Skyrim-like home on Solstheim, on an island due-west of Raven Rock's standing stone, whose NPC cast makes me feel at home; a true welcomed citizen.
This new player home comes with many features, but remains a simple establishment:
[size=2]- [color=#ff0000]Requires [/color]all 3 DLC's.
- Several weapon plaques and displays, 2 mannequins, Hearthfire's oven.
- A unique interior design heavily inspired and replicated from 'Legend of the Eagles Nest'.
- More bookshelves than your local library.
- A secret treasure alcove.
- Layout designed for mods which relocate NPC's.
- Custom Ravenstone banner.
- A heavily atmospheric design on the exterior, as is tradition.[/size]

I may revisit this mod and update it with new designs and features; A dungeon might be applicable in the future.
I hope you all enjoy!
[/font][/size][/font][font=Arial][/font][/center]
author: ClefJ
